description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/net/sign-in.html)

1. Click on ***appointment calendar***.
2. Click on ***link multiple appointment calendars***.
3. Click on ***add resource***.
4. Assign a name for the resource.
5. Assign a color for the resource.
6. Select the appointment-booking calendars that you want to link.
7. You can share the resource with another person, for example an employee. This person will then have access to the appointment-booking calendars as well as the bookings.
8. Click on the code to copy the embed code/widget code. Here you can choose between embedding via JavaScript and iFrame.
9. If needed, the link to the appointment booking website is available.
10. If required, the QR code to the appointment booking website is available.
title: Connect calendars with each other
